thread.title: Will Mickey or Goofy Get Invited To Join The NFL Pro Bowl Teams?
thread.title_full: Will Mickey or Goofy Get Invited To Join The NFL Pro Bowl Teams?

author: Darrell Fry
title: Will Mickey or Goofy Get Invited To Join The NFL Pro Bowl Teams?
text:
After weeks and weeks of training and practicing, Mickey and Goofy showed up Wednesday at the first NFL Pro Bowl practice at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex at Walt Disney World Resort . This was when they learned which of them was selected to be an honorary member of the 2017 teams that include the biggest stars of the NFL.
Would it be Mickey or Goofy? Hopefully it would be the one you chose during the weeks of voting here on the Disney Parks Blog .
Well, wait no longer, check out this video to see how it all unfolded. I don’t want to give it away, but let’s just say that in typical Disney fashion there was a classic storybook ending to it all.

Don’t forget there’s still time to buy some of the few remaining tickets to the NFL Pro Bowl game (Sunday night at 8 p.m. at Camping World Stadium in Orlando) at www.NFL.com/probowlonsale .
